## Documentation Issue

**Page/Section:** (e.g., User Guide > Parser, API Reference > Frame)

**Issue Type:**
- [ ] Typo or formatting error
- [ ] Missing documentation
- [ ] Incorrect or outdated information
- [ ] Unclear explanation
- [ ] Broken link
- [ ] Other

## Description

What's wrong with the documentation or what's missing?

## Suggested Fix

If you have a suggestion for how to improve it, please describe it here.

## Additional Context

Any other information that might be helpful.
